author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FDA Approves Additional Claim For Roche Cobas Zika Test
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Roche Holding AG:
* FDA APPROVES ADDITIONAL CLAIM FOR ROCHE COBAS ZIKA TEST * NEW CLAIM ALLOWS FOR STREAMLINED SCREENING OF POOLED BLOOD OR PLASMA DONATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
